tool_description: Converts coordinates between different coordinate systems and formats including decimal degrees, DMS, UTM, and various projections.

input_format.description: Input coordinate format: decimal_degrees, dms, utm, or mgrs

output_format.description: Output coordinate format: decimal_degrees, dms, utm, or mgrs

input_datum.description: Input datum: WGS84, NAD83, or NAD27

output_datum.description: Output datum: WGS84, NAD83, or NAD27

error_messages: Invalid coordinate format: Check coordinate format matches specified input_format.
Unsupported format combination: Conversion between specified formats not supported.
Invalid datum: Use WGS84, NAD83, or NAD27.
Coordinate out of bounds: One or more coordinates are outside valid geographic ranges.
Conversion limit exceeded: Maximum 100 coordinates per conversion request.
Datum conversion failed: Unable to convert between specified datums.
usage: Provide coordinates with input and output formats and datum specifications. Returns converted coordinates in requested format.

converted_coordinates.description: Array of coordinates converted to output format

conversion_summary.description: Summary of coordinate conversion process and parameters used

failed_conversions.description: Array of coordinates that could not be converted
